sentence.Network_en: The Comparison: The Sea God Image Between Greek Myth and Chinese Antiquity Myth.
sentence.Network_cn: 比较视野下的蒙古族史诗与希腊史诗.

sentence.Network_en: Proteus was a Greek sea - god who could take the form of any creature he wished.
sentence.Network_cn: 普洛提由斯是一希腊海神,他能随心所欲地采用任何动物的形体.

sentence.Network_en: The shallow sea bed yields up an abundance of food.
sentence.Network_cn: 浅海床提供了丰富的食物。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 图文【VOGUE时尚网】Sea-God 海神一词,用于潜水表品牌,既睿智又有点可憎。这个全新意大利品牌狂热而坦然地仿效起 Rolex 劳力士。从其犀利的外观到表盘上有些讽刺的文字.
